category.name: wcf.acp.group
category.item: Members of this group can highlight postings with special CSS classes

CSS classes available for this group. One class per line in the following format: 
className;classTitle
className is the name of the CSS class and classTitle is the title shown to the user when selecting the class.

category.name: wcf.acp.option
category.item: Enables users to highlight their messages when posting by assigning a special CSS class to them.
